### Task Description
- Copilot task name:
- Task objective:
- Special constraints:
  - Except for Markdown (`.md`) files, any single file must not exceed **4000 characters**.
  - Character count is based on UTF-8 characters.
  - If a file exceeds the limit, it must be split using the following naming convention:
    - `file-part-01.ts`
    - `file-part-02.ts`
  - Each generated source file must end with a `// END OF FILE` comment.

### Generated Files
List all files generated or modified by Copilot:

- `src/features/foo/file-part-01.ts`
- `src/features/foo/file-part-02.ts`

### Verification
- [ ] Build and lint completed successfully
- [ ] All unit tests passed
- [ ] Required documentation has been updated
